verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <S%H7919><s%> [is] he that considereth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> him in time רָ֝עָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> of trouble יְֽמַלְּטֵ֥הוּ <S%H4422><s%> will deliver יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִשְׁמְרֵ֣הוּ <S%H8104><s%> will preserve וִֽ֭יחַיֵּהוּ <S%H2421><s%> him and keep him alive [יֶאְשֹּׁר כ] (וְאֻשַּׁ֣ר <S%H833><s%> call ק) בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝תְּנֵ֗הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and thou wilt not deliver בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> him unto the will אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> of his enemies

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִ֭סְעָדֶנּוּ <S%H5582><s%> will strengthen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עֶ֣רֶשׂ <S%H6210><s%> him upon the bed דְּוָ֑י <S%H1741><s%> of languishing כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִ֝שְׁכָּב֗וֹ <S%H4904><s%> all his bed הָפַ֥כְתָּ <S%H2015><s%> thou wilt make בְחָלְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H2483><s%> in his sickness

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD חָנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2603><s%> be merciful רְפָאָ֥ה <S%H7495><s%> unto me heal נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָטָ֥אתִי <S%H2398><s%> for I have sinned לָֽךְ׃

אוֹיְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> Mine enemies יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> speak רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> evil לִ֑י מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> When יָ֝מ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> of me When shall he die וְאָבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> perish שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> and his name

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and when בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> And if he come לִרְא֨וֹת ׀ <S%H7200><s%> to see שָׁ֤וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity יְדַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> [me] he speaketh לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart יִקְבָּץ־ <S%H6908><s%> gathereth אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity ל֑וֹ יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> to itself [when] he goeth לַח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> he telleth

יַ֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> together עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against יִ֭תְלַחֲשׁוּ <S%H3907><s%> me whisper כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שֹׂנְאָ֑י <S%H8130><s%> All that hate עָלַ֓י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Against יַחְשְׁב֖וּ <S%H2803><s%> against me against me do they devise רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> my hurt לִֽי׃

דְּֽבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> disease בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <S%H1100><s%> An evil יָצ֣וּק <S%H3332><s%> [say they] cleaveth fast בּ֑וֹ וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> when שָׁ֝כַ֗ב <S%H7901><s%> unto him and [now] that he lieth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> no more לָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> he shall rise up

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> friend שְׁלוֹמִ֨י ׀ <S%H7965><s%> Yea mine own familiar אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom בָּטַ֣חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> in whom I trusted ב֭וֹ אוֹכֵ֣ל <S%H398><s%> which did eat לַחְמִ֑י <S%H3899><s%> of my bread הִגְדִּ֖יל <S%H1431><s%> hath lifted up עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against עָקֵֽב׃ <S%H6119><s%> [his] heel

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> be merciful וַהֲקִימֵ֑נִי <S%H6965><s%> unto me and raise me up וַֽאֲשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <S%H7999><s%> that I may requite לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

בְּזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> By this I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חָפַ֣צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> that thou favourest בִּ֑י כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָרִ֖יעַ <S%H7321><s%> doth not triumph אֹיְבִ֣י <S%H341><s%> me because mine enemy עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I בְּ֭תֻמִּי <S%H8537><s%> me in mine integrity תָּמַ֣כְתָּ <S%H8551><s%> And as for me thou upholdest בִּ֑י וַתַּצִּיבֵ֖נִי <S%H5324><s%> and settest לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> me before thy face לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵֽ֭הָעוֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> from everlasting וְעַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against הָעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> and to everlasting אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <S%H543><s%> Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> and Amen
